articles.content: The brokerage firm Sharekhan in its latest report has said "Tata Power Company Limited's (TPCL's) Q4FY22 adjusted PAT of Rs. 653 crore (up 66.3% y-o-y) was 4% above our estimate of Rs. 632 crore prim… [+2598 chars]
